profile.name: Susan Khadka
profile.description: Full Stack Software Engineer with 1+ years of experience building scalable web applications using JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, and modern frameworks. Proven track record in optimizing application performance, implementing real-time features, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Experienced in front-end and back-end development with experience in MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and AWS services.

tasks: Designed and built modern B2B marketplace interface from scratch using Next.js 14 and TypeScript, enabling seamless interaction within a unified platform ecosystem.
Implemented secure user authentication flow with role-based permissions, eliminating previous access bottlenecks and improving user onboarding.
Created reusable component library with TanStack Query integration, eliminating duplicate API calls, reducing data fetching time by 60%.
Led frontend development of automated quotation management system, enabling buyers and suppliers to process RFQs faster than manual workflows.
Engineered interactive analytics dashboards to track customer API usage and resource consumption, enabling data-driven subscription pricing strategies for 50+ enterprise clients.
Engineered robust ETL pipeline processing 12,000+ weather data records daily from AllisonHouse API, implementing error handling and data validation to maintain accuracy.
Transformed radar visualization performance through strategic code refactoring and asset optimization, achieving 80% reduction in load times (from 18-20 seconds to 3-4 seconds).
Enhanced application accessibility by implementing WCAG 2.1 standards and keyboard navigation, expanding platform usability for diverse user base.
Delivered cross-platform school management application using Flutter and Dart, streamlining administrative processes for 30+ educational institutions.
Constructed real-time notification system with Firebase Cloud Messaging, driving 25% increase in parent-teacher engagement and reducing communication delays.
Optimized app state management using Riverpod architecture, resulting in 30% improvement in app responsiveness and reduced memory usage.
Provided technical mentorship to 2 intern developers through code reviews and pair programming sessions, accelerating team delivery timelines.

projects.title: Vintage Vault
projects.description: Vintage vault is a web-based auction application for antique items that leverages web sockets for real time communication between users.

projects.title: Social Hub
projects.description: Social Hub is a dynamic social community based platform designed to provide users with a Reddit-like experience. It helps users to connect with people of similar interests and hobbies.

projects.title: Taskboard
projects.description: TaskBoard is a simple and effective task management system that allows organizations to register and manage their employees efficiently.

projects.title: Journal
projects.description: It is a personal blog platform with responsive design and robust, to easily create and manage my own blogs with markdown files. Leveraging the simplicity and versatility of markdown.

projects.title: Sahayata Setu
projects.description: Android application that connects donors, beneficiaries, volunteer and NGO's on a single platform.

awards.event: Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav Hackathon 2022 - Appreciation
points: Led a high-performing team to victory, securing second place among 2500+ competitors by developing an innovative solution for non-monetary donations.
